```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(RNAPerm)
```



```{r}
### Generate data from NB distribution and put into array
Y <- rnbinom(200*10000, mu = 10, size = 1/2)
Y <- data.frame(array(Y, dim = c(200, 10000)))
X <- as.factor(rep(c("A", "B"), each = 100))
p1 <- ClassicPermTest(X, Y, 1000)
p2 <- MWUTest(X, Y)
p3 <- FlipScoresTestNoCovBasic(X, Y, 1000)
```

```{r}
x <- seq(0, 1, length.out = 10000)
plot(x, sort(p1), type = "l", col = "purple")
lines(x, sort(p2), col = "darkgreen")
lines(x, sort(p3), col = "blue")
lines(x, x, col = "red")
```
